main event: A bright, round object was observed hovering and moving silently in various directions near Palmer, Massachusetts on 17 September 1967.
interesting points: The object changed colors from white to red and back to white during the observation., The object's size was estimated to be approximately 8-10 feet in diameter., It was reported to be hovering at an altitude of 700-800 feet., The object was observed for a duration of 15-20 minutes., The weather conditions were partly cloudy with calm winds.
